data.oai_dc:dc: Figure 5. Selection in temporally heterogeneous innate immune environments leads to VSV strains with differential capacities to block IFN-β production.

This data corresponds to the graph in Figure 5. It describes the secretion of IFN-b in PC3 cells (as measured by ELISA) after infection with different strains of VSV experimentally evolved in heterogeneous innate immune environments.
